version_description:
New in 5.1.2:
- by popular request, PDF Horizontal Scroll Lock feature is back
- FIXED: an issue with unzipping some ZIP archives
- FIXED: some annotations hidden from annotation summaries for users with no Pro Pack

Earlier:
Enormous GoodReader 5 upgrade. New everything. Full list of new features on our website: goodreader.com

New in 5.1.2:
- by popular request, PDF Horizontal Scroll Lock feature is back
- FIXED: an issue with unzipping some ZIP archives
- FIXED: some annotations hidden from annotation summaries for users with no Pro Pack

Earlier:
Enormous GoodReader 5 upgrade. New everything. Full list of new features on our website: goodreader.com

New in 5.1.3:
- FIXED: VoiceOver not working properly for visually impaired users
- FIXED: SharePoint via WebDAV authentication issue

Enormous GoodReader 5 upgrade. New everything. Full list of new features on our website: goodreader.com
Dark Mode: gorgeous black interface, matching the Dark Mode setting of iOS
Dark Mode: gorgeous black interface, matching the Dark Mode setting of iOS

- better integration with iOS: "Copy to GoodReader" action in the system's Share menu
- updated EULA and Privacy Policy

- better integration with iOS: "Copy to GoodReader" action in the system's Share menu
- updated EULA and Privacy Policy

- the app now accepts drag-and-drop files and folders from compatible apps such as Files and Photos (iPad only)
- PDF Annotations improvement: fill color for rectangles and ovals can now be edited or removed

- the app now accepts drag-and-drop files and folders from compatible apps such as Files and Photos (iPad only)
- PDF Annotations improvement: fill color for rectangles and ovals can now be edited or removed
Simplified, more intuitive main screen.
Simplified, more intuitive main screen.

Support for amazing iOS 14 features:
- Widgets. Two beautiful types of widgets to bring file shortcuts and most used buttons right at your fingertips.
- Scribble. GoodReader works perfectly with Apple Pencil and Scribble - new iOS 14 experience allowing you to simply write where you previously had to type.
